com.box.sdk

Class BoxAPIException

  • Object
    • Throwable
      • Exception
        • RuntimeException
          • BoxAPIException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxAPIResponseException

    public class BoxAPIException
extends RuntimeException
    Thrown to indicate that an error occurred while communicating with the Box API.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BoxAPIException(String message)
      Constructs a BoxAPIException with a specified message.
      BoxAPIException(String message, int responseCode, String response)
      Constructs a BoxAPIException with details about the server's response.
      BoxAPIException(String message, int responseCode, String responseBody, Map<String,List<String>> responseHeaders)
      Constructs a BoxAPIException with details about the server's response, including response headers.
      BoxAPIException(String message, int responseCode, String responseBody, Map<String,List<String>> responseHeaders, Throwable cause)
      Constructs a BoxAPIException that includes the response headers.
      BoxAPIException(String message, int responseCode, String response, Throwable cause)
      Constructs a BoxAPIException that wraps another underlying exception with details about the server's response.
      BoxAPIException(String message, Throwable cause)
      Constructs a BoxAPIException that wraps another underlying exception.

                       int responseCode,
                       String response)
        Constructs a BoxAPIException with details about the server's response.
        Parameters:
        message - a message explaining why the exception occurred.
        responseCode - the response code returned by the Box server.
        response - the response body returned by the Box server.

        responseCode - the response code returned by the Box server.
        responseBody - the response body returned by the Box server.
        responseHeaders - the response headers returned by the Box server.
